pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 18, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Boston, Massachusetts

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chief Executive Officer of Wayfair, Niraj Shah.

Muse Salon
2nd floor
Kimpton Marlowe Hotel

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8 a.m.

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion and a question and answer session at the Solve at Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) Conference.

Kresge Auditorium
MIT

Notes for media:

    • Pooled broadcast coverage from centre riser position
    • Open coverage for reporters and stills
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the MIT Media Lab and the Innovation Exhibition.

Media Lab
Innovation Exhibition
Silverman Skyline/Winter Garden Rooms
6th floor
MIT

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
